NK003(ga)012:1793: rigs sngags rgyal po dge ba can //
NK003(ga)012:1794: gdul dka' po dag 'dul ba po //
NK003(ga)012:1796: lha yi dbang po nye dbang po //
NK003(ga)012:1797: stobs ldan sa gsum dbang byed kyang //
NK003(ga)012:1798: 'jug pa bcu yi rnam par rol //
NK003(ga)012:1799: lha chen sred med bu la bstod //
NK003(ga)012:1800: mthu chen srid pa kun gyis gtso //
NK003(ga)012:1802: thabs mkhas mu stegs mthu yis 'dul //
NK003(ga)012:1803: lha chen drag po khyod la bstod //
NK003(ga)012:1804: zhi zhing rnam par sgeg pa'i lus //
NK003(ga)012:1805: yid bzhin rin chen rgyan 'chang zhing //
NK003(ga)012:1806: bde gshegs bstan la dad cing gus //
NK003(ga)012:1807: tshogs zhes grags pa khyod la bstod //
NK003(ga)012:1809: na mahsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sat+wa n+aam /
NK003(ga)012:1810: sarba tra sam ku ru mi ta a b+hi dz+ny+aa ra shi ni na mahstu te s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)012:1811: de nas gshegs su gsol ba'i rgya bcings te /
NK003(ga)012:1813: sarba n+ai ba ra na biskam+b+hi ni gats+tsha /
NK003(ga)012:1818: ga na re re'i mthar gats+tsha /
NK003(ga)012:1821: spyan drangs pa'i lha gzhal yas khang dang bcas pa gshegs /
NK003(ga)012:1822: sngags kyis sprul pa'i lha dam tshig pa rnams bdag la rim gyis thim /
NK003(ga)012:1823: bdag gi lha'i sku gzugs zla ba'i steng gi yi ge la thim /
NK003(ga)012:1825: de rnam smin gyi lus la thim par gyur /
NK003(ga)012:1826: ces bdag bskyed bsdus te bkra shis brjod /
NK003(ga)012:1827: de'i phyir nyin nyi ma shar ba dang /
NK003(ga)012:1828: khrus nas bzlas pa'i bar byas te thig skud dkar /
NK003(ga)012:1832: nag po lnga las sngags gnyis kyis bsang gtor byas la /
NK003(ga)012:1834: b+h+r+au bzlas pas dang po so sor sgril /
NK003(ga)012:1835: de nas gcig tu bsgril las sngags brgya bzlas te /
NK003(ga)012:1837: mdun gyi nam mkhar dkon mchog gsum dad dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad bsam nas /
NK003(ga)012:1839: slob dpon lhor gnas pa'i thig skud bzung nas byang du gnas pa'i grogs la thig sna gtad /
NK003(ga)012:1841: shar dang lhor gnas tshangs thig gnyis //
NK003(ga)012:1842: mer gnas shar lho'i rtsa thig gnyis //
NK003(ga)012:1843: rlung gnas nub byang rtsa thig gnyis //
NK003(ga)012:1844: me dang bden bral gnas zur thig /
NK003(ga)012:1845: gnyis gdab slob dpon 'dug phyogs te //
NK003(ga)012:1846: slob ma de las ldog pa'o //
NK003(ga)012:1847: de'ang dang por nam mkha' dang /
NK003(ga)012:1849: de nas shes rab snying po bzlas pa der /
NK003(ga)012:1850: dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs thams cad nam mkhar bsam nas /
NK003(ga)012:1851: yid kyi nus pas yan lag bdun pa byas nas dkyil 'khor bris te /
NK003(ga)012:1852: tshon rnams las sngags gnyis bsang /
NK003(ga)012:1853: te dza'i sngags rgyas gzi byin bskyed /
NK003(ga)012:1855: de nas lha gnas kyi sa gzhi la ba byung lnga dang dris bku /
NK003(ga)012:1856: h'u zhes tshon la dri chu'i bsang gtor byas la /
NK003(ga)012:1862: rtsig pa nang nas dkar dmar ser ljang nag po /
NK003(ga)012:1865: gtso bo'i gnas su gdan ser po gru bzhi pa
NK003(ga)012:1866: la gnas pa'i pad zlar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa
NK003(ga)012:1868: 'das pa'i 'khor gsum so so'i gnas su gdan khri zlum po dang pad zlar /
NK003(ga)012:1870: phyag rdor la rdo rje sngon po /
NK003(ga)012:1872: 'jig rten pa'i 'khor gsum la gdan zlum po re'i steng du /
NK003(ga)012:1873: phyag rdor gyi mdun du khyab 'jug gi dung nag po //
NK003(ga)012:1874: 'khor lo'i thad du drag po rtse gsum /
NK003(ga)012:1875: de'i g.yon du tshogs bdag gi g.yung drung gru bzhi g.yas bskor re /
NK003(ga)012:1876: mtshan ma gsum po mgo nub bstan no //
NK003(ga)012:1877: de nas srog shing tshad ldan 'du byas la /
NK003(ga)012:1878: de'i bya spyod kyi gzungs dkri ba'i thad kar /
NK003(ga)012:1879: phyogs bzhir gzungs khung brus la /
NK003(ga)012:1881: sarba ta th+aa ga ta bi pu la yash+ti ma
NK003(ga)012:1882: ni kan ka r+aa dza ta bi bu shi ta
NK003(ga)012:1884: sa man+te bi lo ki te /
NK003(ga)012:1885: sa ra sa ra ma ma sarba p+aa pam bi shwa d+ha ni /
NK003(ga)012:1886: sam b+ha d+ha ne pra pa ra ash+ti pa ri
NK003(ga)012:1887: ma ni dush+ta hu ru tse ra ma la bi
NK003(ga)012:1889: zhes pa dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /
NK003(ga)012:1890: na mo b+ha ga ba te /
NK003(ga)012:1891: na ba na ba sogs sgrib sel gyi gzungs dgu bcu rtsa dgu re bris te phyogs rer gzhug /
NK003(ga)012:1892: srog shing gi rtse mo brus pa'i nang du /
NK003(ga)012:1893: 'od zer dri med kyi gzungs ril po dang /
NK003(ga)012:1894: gtsug tor rnam rgyal gyi gzungs /
NK003(ga)012:1895: ring bsrel sogs byin rten gzhug /
NK003(ga)012:1896: srog shing gi rtsa ba brus par 'od zer dri
NK003(ga)012:1897: med kyi snying po dang rten 'brel snying po gzhug
NK003(ga)012:1898: / gzhan yang gzungs rnams nas ji ltar 'os par
NK003(ga)012:1899: so so'i go rim bzhin ma nor ba dkris te
NK003(ga)012:1900: / / srog shing la spyang khrus rab gnas byas
NK003(ga)012:1901: te dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su btsugs la ya yo
NK003(ga)012:1903: dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu'i grwa bzhir dung zhal re re /
NK003(ga)012:1904: shar gyi snam bu'i khar spos snod gsum /
NK003(ga)012:1905: lho'i snam bur dri'i dung zhal /
NK003(ga)012:1908: nub kyi snam bur til nag dang ma sha dang 'bras bsres nas btsos pa'i thug pa dang /
NK003(ga)012:1909: zas dkar gsum rnams bum par blugs pa /
NK003(ga)012:1910: shing thog sna tshogs kyi 'bras bu dgu bcu rtsa dgu rnams bkod /
NK003(ga)012:1911: byang gi snam bur kha zas sna tshogs kyi gtor ma dang /
NK003(ga)012:1912: dri chus bkang ba'i bum pa mgul chings kha rgyan dang bcas pa /
NK003(ga)012:1915: nub byang gi grwar dri'i dung chos kyi rgyab tu
NK003(ga)012:1916: shing zla gam la tshogs bdag glang zhal dgra s+t+wa
NK003(ga)012:1917: dang la phug 'dzin pa bris pa'i spyi bo'i steng
NK003(ga)012:1919: dkyil 'khor gyi mthar dri dang snum bsres pas byugs /
NK003(ga)012:1920: phyogs rer mchod pa tshar re'am /
NK003(ga)012:1921: ma 'byor na nub nas brtsam ste /
NK003(ga)012:1935: phyogs bzhi mchod yon gyi stegs bu la rdzas bdun
NK003(ga)012:1936: dang ldan pa'i mchod yon bzed zhal dang bcas pa
NK003(ga)012:1937: / phyogs mtshams brgyad du tog rma bya'i mdongs kyis byas pa'i rgyan mtshan shar dkar /
NK003(ga)012:1944: byang shar du ljang ser rnams dang /
NK003(ga)012:1945: bkra shis pa'i rdzas brgyad rnams kyis brgyan /
NK003(ga)012:1946: phyi nas ras kyis zlum por bskor /
NK003(ga)012:1949: rigs kyi lha la phyag bya /
NK003(ga)012:1950: gtso bo'i snying po cung zad bzlas nas mtshan ma brtag /
NK003(ga)012:1952: sngar bsnyen pa'i rjes su bshad par ltar /
NK003(ga)012:1953: bdag mdun ra d+r+wa phyogs bcings pa dang bcas pa rnams bsdus la bkra shis bya'o //
NK003(ga)012:1954: de nas sgrub mchod dngos gzhi ni /
NK003(ga)012:1955: nangs par snga bar khrus byas /
NK003(ga)012:1957: khro bo mnol ba med pa'i sngags rgyas bdag bsrung ba nas /
NK003(ga)012:1958: ras kyi ze'u kha bcings pa'i bar bsnyen pa ltar dang /
NK003(ga)012:1959: de nas rnal 'byor dngos gzhi ni /
NK003(ga)012:1960: bdag gis bsgral daka'i srid mtsho las //
NK003(ga)012:1961: zhes pa nas sgrib sel gyi bdag bskyed mdun bskyed kyi /
NK003(ga)012:1962: bla bre la sogs pas brgyan par gyur //
NK003(ga)012:1963: ces pa'i bar sngar ltar byas la /
NK003(ga)012:1964: de nas lha so so'i sngags 'di tshar bdun mi
NK003(ga)012:1965: brjod par tshar re re brjod pas lha bsgom pa
NK003(ga)012:1966: nas ji srid bzlas pa'i bar lha sta gon bzhin
NK003(ga)012:1967: bya / de nas lha rang rang gi sngags lan
NK003(ga)012:1968: gsum gsum bzla zhing so so'i phyag rgya 'ching ste
NK003(ga)012:1969: bya / / lag gnyis phan tshun khu tshur bcangs nas mthe bong gnyis brtan pas gtso bo'i 'o //
NK003(ga)012:1970: thal mo brkyang ba sbyar nas cung zad rtse bskum pa sgrib sel /
NK003(ga)012:1971: gtso bo'i rgya las mthe bong g.yas gcig pu brtan pa spyan ras gzigs /
NK003(ga)012:1972: lag gnyis so sor phan tshun basngamasa pa las gung mo gnyis sbyar te brkyang ba phyag rdor /
NK003(ga)012:1973: thal mo khong stong las mthe bong gnyis btud nas cung zad bstod pa khyab 'jug /
NK003(ga)012:1974: g.yas pa'i mthe bos mathe'u chung mnan nas sor ma
NK003(ga)012:1975: lhag gsum brkyang pa'i rtse mthur du bstan pa drag
NK003(ga)012:1976: po / lag gnyis bkan te mdzub srin bsnol bar dkris la /
NK003(ga)012:1977: mthe bong gnyis lag pa'i nang du bkug nas sor
NK003(ga)012:1978: mo lhag ma rnams kyang lag steng du bkug pa
NK003(ga)012:1979: tshogs bdag gi'o // de nas rigs gsum gyi sngags /
NK003(ga)012:1983: gsum phyag rgya rim par thal mo bkan pa las mdzub mo rtse bkug pa dang /
NK003(ga)012:1984: thal mo sbyar ba pad+ma ba phye ba'i tshul dang /
NK003(ga)012:1985: thal mo ldog ste sbyar ba mthe bong dang mthe chung gnyis sbyar ba'o //
NK003(ga)012:1986: +aa ha ra sogs spos kyi phyag rgya spos phul la /
NK003(ga)012:1988: mgon po thugs rje sogs kyi mthar /
NK003(ga)012:1989: sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu basngagasa //
NK003(ga)012:1990: yon tan dam pa kun bsags pa //
NK003(ga)012:1991: spyan ras gzigs zhes mtshan gsol ba'i //
NK003(ga)012:1992: rtag par brtse la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK003(ga)012:1993: stobs po che la drag shul ldan //
NK003(ga)012:1994: rigs sngags rgyal po dge ba can //
NK003(ga)012:1995: gdul dka' po dag 'dul ba po //
NK003(ga)012:1997: lha yi dbang po nye dbang po //
NK003(ga)012:1998: stobs ldan sa gsum dbang byed cing //
NK003(ga)012:1999: 'jug pa bcu yi rnam par rol //
NK003(ga)012:2000: lha chen sred med bu la bstod //
NK003(ga)012:2001: mthu chen srid pa kun gyi gtso //
NK003(ga)012:2003: thabs mkhas mu stegs mthu yis 'dul //
NK003(ga)012:2004: lha chen drag po khyod la bstod //
NK003(ga)012:2005: zhi zhing rnam par sgeg pa'i lus //
NK003(ga)012:2006: yid bzhin rin chen rgyan 'chang zhing //
NK003(ga)012:2007: bde gshegs bstan la dad cing gus //
NK003(ga)012:2008: tshogs zhes grags pa khyod la bstod //
NK003(ga)012:2009: bstod par 'os pa thams cad la //
NK003(ga)012:2011: na mahsarba bud+d+ha bod+hi sat+wa n+aam /
NK003(ga)012:2012: sarba tra sam ku ru mi ta a b+hi dz+ny+aa ra shi ni na mohstu te s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)012:2013: de nas thal mo sbyar te /
NK003(ga)012:2014: sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad kun //
NK003(ga)012:2015: deng 'dir bdag la dgongs su gsol //
NK003(ga)012:2016: thog ma med nas da lta'i bar //
NK003(ga)012:2017: mi dge bcu dang mtshams med lnga //
NK003(ga)012:2018: sems ni nyon mongs dbang gyur pa'i //
NK003(ga)012:2019: sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi //
NK003(ga)012:2020: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la //
NK003(ga)012:2021: rtag par bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
NK003(ga)012:2022: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang //
NK003(ga)012:2024: rang gzhan don gnyis rab bsgrub phyir //
NK003(ga)012:2025: byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi //
NK003(ga)012:2026: sems can bde dang ldan gyur cig /
NK003(ga)012:2027: sdug bsngal kun dang bral gyur cig /
NK003(ga)012:2028: bde dang rtag tu mi 'bral zhing //
NK003(ga)012:2029: chos kun mnyam nyid rtogs par shog /
NK003(ga)012:2031: glegs bam bklag par bya ste /
NK003(ga)012:2033: de nas mchod rten gyi phyogs bzhir stegs bu'i steng du mchod pa bsham /
NK003(ga)012:2034: de'i mdun du stegs la dkar gtor zlum po brgyad dam bsdu na gcig bsham la /
NK003(ga)012:2036: phyag mchod gtor bsngo bzlas pa gsol gdab rnams mchod
NK003(ga)012:2037: rten gyi phyogs bzhi nas tshar re re bya bar
NK003(ga)012:2038: gsungs pas / thog mar dpon slob thams cad shar nas mchod rten la zhal phyogs pa bzhengs te /
NK003(ga)012:2039: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
NK003(ga)012:2040: byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad dang /
NK003(ga)012:2041: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnams dang /
NK003(ga)012:2045: khyab 'jug rnams mngon sum du byon par gyur /
NK003(ga)012:2047: phyag 'tshal bzhin du 'di skad brjod do //
NK003(ga)012:2048: bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa la sogs shar phyogs
NK003(ga)012:2049: kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
NK003(ga)012:2050: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal
NK003(ga)012:2052: bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog la sogs pa lho
NK003(ga)012:2053: phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa sogs 'gres shes par
NK003(ga)012:2054: byas te / 'od dpag med la sogs te nub
NK003(ga)012:2055: phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra la sogs
NK003(ga)012:2056: te byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge
NK003(ga)012:2057: 'dzin glang po dam pa'i dpal la sogs pa byang
NK003(ga)012:2058: shar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal
NK003(ga)012:2059: la sogs pa shar lho'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyi
NK003(ga)012:2060: ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal la sogs
NK003(ga)012:2061: pa lho nub kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam
NK003(ga)012:2062: pa la sogs pa nub byang gi de bzhin gshegs
NK003(ga)012:2063: byas te / pa / rnam par snang mdzad la
NK003(ga)012:2064: sogs pa 'og phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ye
NK003(ga)012:2065: shes kyi 'od zer la sogs pa steng phyogs kyi
NK003(ga)012:2066: de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar bdag cag gi ston
NK003(ga)012:2067: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh+aakya thub
NK003(ga)012:2068: pa gdul bya'i dbang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir mya
NK003(ga)012:2069: ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul bstan kyang /
NK003(ga)012:2070: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
NK003(ga)012:2071: rnam par rol pa sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don
NK003(ga)012:2072: mdzad cing bzhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo
NK003(ga)012:2074: gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i zhing mtha' yas mu med pa
NK003(ga)012:2075: na dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
NK003(ga)012:2077: de dag gi mchod rten dang /
NK003(ga)012:2079: gsung rab dam pa'i chos thams cad la 'phags pa
NK003(ga)012:2080: byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems
NK003(ga)012:2081: dpa' chen po brgyad la phyag de dag la sogs
NK003(ga)012:2082: te byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po thams cad
NK003(ga)012:2083: la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon dbang po nor bu
NK003(ga)012:2084: bzang po la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
NK003(ga)012:2085: chen po brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa la rgyal po
NK003(ga)012:2089: rnam thos kyi bu rnams 'khor dang bcas pa la tshangs pa dang /
NK003(ga)012:2091: sred med kyi bu la sogs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK003(ga)012:2095: mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba'i nyer spyod rol mor byas pas mchod /
NK003(ga)012:2096: gtor ma rnams byin gyis rlabs te /
NK003(ga)012:2097: ma h+aa yak+sha se na pa ta zhes pas mnod sbyin dang /
NK003(ga)012:2098: d+h+r+ai ta rash+ta ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)012:2099: be ru d+h+aa ka ye be ru pak+sha ye bee sh+r+aa ma na ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)012:2100: zhes rgyal po chen po sde bzhi /
NK003(ga)012:2101: bra h+ma na ya tshangs pa /
NK003(ga)012:2103: bish+nu pa sred med kyi bu sde /
NK003(ga)012:2105: sa pa ri w+aa ra na mahsarba ta th+aa ga
NK003(ga)012:2106: ta b+h+yo bi shwa sogs btags pa gsum gsum gyis
NK003(ga)012:2107: phul / tshangs dang dbang po khyab 'jug gnod sbyin brgyad //
NK003(ga)012:2108: rgyal chen bzhi sogs gtsang ris mgon po ste //
NK003(ga)012:2109: bstan pa bsrung bar zhal bzhes 'phags pa'i tshogs //
NK003(ga)012:2110: dkar phyogs skyong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK003(ga)012:2115: pra ba re dzi na ba re /
NK003(ga)012:2117: sarba ta th+aa ga ta d+h+aa tu gar+b+he /
NK003(ga)012:2119: +aa ya ta to ba ni s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)012:2120: sarba de wa ni ba ha ya bi bud+d+ha a d+hish+tha na sa ma ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)012:2121: zhes pa lan nyi shu rtsa brgyad bzlas /
NK003(ga)012:2122: de nas pus btsugs la thal mo sbyar te /
NK003(ga)012:2124: ston pa bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa dang /
NK003(ga)012:2125: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcos ldan 'das bye ba phrag
NK003(ga)012:2126: dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad
NK003(ga)012:2127: dang / byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i sras brgyad dang /
NK003(ga)012:2128: khyad par du dpal gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang /
NK003(ga)012:2129: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po brgyad dang /
NK003(ga)012:2130: rgyal po chen po sde bzhi dang /
NK003(ga)012:2133: sred med kyi bu la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
NK003(ga)012:2134: bdag cag gis 'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med
NK003(ga)012:2135: pa rnam par dag pa 'od kyi gzungs las byung
NK003(ga)012:2136: ba'i cho ga bzhin 'phags pa gdan 'dzom par mdzad
NK003(ga)012:2137: pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs su gsol te /
NK003(ga)012:2138: 'phags pa rnams spyan drangs nas mchod cing gsol ba btab pa dang /
NK003(ga)012:2139: mchod rten gyi srog shing btsugs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis /
NK003(ga)012:2140: 'phags pa thams cad kyis mchod rten 'di chos kyi skur byin gyis brlabs te /
NK003(ga)012:2141: ring bsrel dang ldan par mdzad nas mchod rten la mchod pa dang /
NK003(ga)012:2142: rim gro byed cing srog shing brtan par mdzad du gsol /
NK003(ga)012:2143: ch+geemo la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdig
NK003(ga)012:2144: pa dang sgrib pa thams cad byang zhing dag nas
NK003(ga)012:2145: tshe ring zhing nad med pa dang /
NK003(ga)012:2146: bar chad kyi bgegs thams cad dang bral ba dang /
NK003(ga)012:2147: mthar bla na med pa'i byang chub myur du thob par byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
NK003(ga)012:2148: sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces /
NK003(ga)012:2152: dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po thob cing /
NK003(ga)012:2154: gsang sngags rgyal po'i cho ga sngar bstan pa bzhin du bya ste /
NK003(ga)012:2155: dgu bcu rtsa dgur yi ger bris la /
NK003(ga)012:2156: sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten gyi mdun du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas la ba'i lci bas byugs te /
NK003(ga)012:2157: grwa bzhir dri'i chu phor bu gang ba re re bzhag /
NK003(ga)012:2158: bdug spos kyi snod 'thul ba yang bzhag nas /
NK003(ga)012:2159: snod chen po'i nang du me tog dang /
NK003(ga)012:2162: dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag pa dang /
NK003(ga)012:2165: 'bras rnams bsres te btsos pa'i 'bras thug k+r+ai sa ra zhes bya ba dang /
NK003(ga)012:2167: 'di rnams bum pa'i nang du blugs pa dang /
NK003(ga)012:2168: yang shing thog sna tshogs pa 'bras bu dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /
NK003(ga)012:2169: kha zas ming gis smros pa 'di rnams dang /
NK003(ga)012:2170: spos dang me tog la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi
NK003(ga)012:2171: steng du bkram la gsang sngags kyi yi ge mchod
NK003(ga)012:2172: rten gyi srog shing gi nang du bcug nas /
NK003(ga)012:2173: mchod rten gyi phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
NK003(ga)012:2174: cad mngon sum du dmigs te phyag byas la sems
NK003(ga)012:2175: rtse gcig pas gsang sngags 'di dag 'don par bya'o
NK003(ga)012:2177: bi pu la bi ma le /
NK003(ga)012:2178: pra ba re dzi na ba re /
NK003(ga)012:2180: sarba ta th+aa ga ta d+h+aa tu gar+b+he /
NK003(ga)012:2182: +aa ya ta to ba ni s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)012:2183: sarba de wa ni ba ha ya bi bud+d+ha a d+hish+tha na sa ma ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)012:2184: bdug spos 'thul ba rgyun mi chad par bya zhing /
NK003(ga)012:2185: gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa brgyad bton la /
NK003(ga)012:2186: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad dang /
NK003(ga)012:2187: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po brgyad dang /
NK003(ga)012:2189: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
NK003(ga)012:2192: sred med kyi bu rnams de'i mod la mchod rten de la mchod pa dang /
NK003(ga)012:2193: rim gro byed pa de dang srog shing brtan par byed do //
NK003(ga)012:2194: de bas gong du yang sangs rgyas bye ba 'bum phrag dgu cu rtsa dgu dang /
NK003(ga)012:2195: gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang gnas der gshegs te /
NK003(ga)012:2196: mchod rten de la mchod pa dang /
NK003(ga)012:2197: chos kyi skur byin gyis rlob cing ring bsrel dang ldan par mdzad do //
NK003(ga)012:2198: de ltar sems thag pa nas cho ga tshul bzhin du byas na yon tan de dag dang /
NK003(ga)012:2199: gzhan yang mchod rten yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin
NK003(ga)012:2200: po che las byas pa'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur
NK003(ga)012:2201: / rin po che'i rnam pa bye ba phrag khrig
NK003(ga)012:2202: brgya stong du ma las mchod rten byas pa dang
NK003(ga)012:2204: dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dang ldan zhing
NK003(ga)012:2205: lus rnam par dag la tshe ring nad med pa
NK003(ga)012:2206: dang / bgegs thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
NK003(ga)012:2207: gang gzhan la la zhig gis mchod rten 'di mthong ngam /
NK003(ga)012:2208: mchod rten de'i dril bu'i sgra thos na'ang las kyi sgrib pa dang /
NK003(ga)012:2209: sdig pa thams cad byang bar gyur te /
NK003(ga)012:2210: mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang byang nas 'chi
NK003(ga)012:2211: ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu bde ba can gyi
NK003(ga)012:2213: gang la la zhig gis mchod rten de'i ming tsam
NK003(ga)012:2214: thos pa yang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bla na
NK003(ga)012:2215: med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur /
NK003(ga)012:2216: tha na bya dang ri dwags la sogs pa sems
NK003(ga)012:2217: can gang gis mthong ba de yang tshe 'phos nas
NK003(ga)012:2218: dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs te bsod nams dang ldan
NK003(ga)012:2220: zhes bka' stsal ba'i phan yon thams cad ch+gee mo
NK003(ga)012:2221: la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad la 'phral du
NK003(ga)012:2223: de bzhin gshegs pas bka' yang dag pa tshad mar
NK003(ga)012:2224: gyur pas ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin du bden
NK003(ga)012:2225: pa mngon sum du bstan pa ci gnang /
NK003(ga)012:2226: zhes lan gsum du gsol ba gdab bo //
NK003(ga)012:2227: de bzhin mchod rten gyi phyogs bzhi ka nas tshar re byas la /
NK003(ga)012:2228: mjug tu shar phyogs nas bkra shis dang smon lam rgyas par gdab bo //
NK003(ga)012:2229: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi mjug chog ni /
NK003(ga)012:2231: bsang sbyang byin gyis brlabs nas mchod yon dang /
NK003(ga)012:2232: nyer spyod nas so so'i sngags rgyas mchod nas /
NK003(ga)012:2233: bla ma dang 'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med
NK003(ga)012:2234: pa'i lha tshogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
NK003(ga)012:2235: thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
NK003(ga)012:2236: khyed rnams la mkhyen pa'i ye shes /
NK003(ga)012:2238: mdzad pa'i phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnga' ba lags pas /
NK003(ga)012:2239: spyir rgyal ba'i bstan pa spyi dang /
NK003(ga)012:2240: khyad par snga 'gyur rdo rje theg pa'i bstan pa
NK003(ga)012:2241: rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du
NK003(ga)012:2242: gnas pa dang / bstan 'dzin gyi skyes bu rnams
NK003(ga)012:2243: kyi sku tshe brtan cing thugs kyi bzhed pa'i don
NK003(ga)012:2245: bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sdig sgrib nad
NK003(ga)012:2246: gdon sogs 'gal rkyen mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad
NK003(ga)012:2247: zhi zhing / mthun rkyen chos dang mthun pa'i bsam
NK003(ga)012:2248: pa yid bzhin du 'grub par byin gyis brlab tu
NK003(ga)012:2249: zhi zhing / gsol / khyad par du yang bdag
NK003(ga)012:2250: cag dpon slob yon mchod 'khor dang bcas pas thog
NK003(ga)012:2251: drangs sems can thams cad kyi gnas skabs su mi
NK003(ga)012:2252: mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad zhi nas 'og min gyi
NK003(ga)012:2253: srid pa'i mthar thug pa'i 'jig rten gyi dngos grub
NK003(ga)012:2255: mthar thug sgrib gnyis bag chags dang bcas pa ma
NK003(ga)012:2256: lus pa zhi zhing phyag rgya chen po mchog gi
NK003(ga)012:2257: dngos grub tshe 'di nyid la thob par byin gyis
NK003(ga)012:2258: brlab tu gsol / de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i yig brgya bdun bzlas te /
NK003(ga)012:2259: ma rnyed yongs su sogs kyis bzod par gsol /
NK003(ga)012:2261: bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis //
NK003(ga)012:2262: 'jig rten 'di ni myur du 'tshang rgya shog /
NK003(ga)012:2263: 'gro la phan phyir chos rnams ston bgyid cing //
NK003(ga)012:2264: sdug bsngal gyis gzir sems can sgrol bar shog /
NK003(ga)012:2267: ji srid sa chu sogs dang /
NK003(ga)012:2268: 'dir ni gzugs dang sogs kyi mthar /
NK003(ga)012:2269: su pra tish+thasa brtan bzhugs phul /
NK003(ga)012:2270: bdag gi lha'i sku gzugs zla ba'i steng gi yi ge la thim /
NK003(ga)012:2272: de rnam smin gyi lus la thim par gyur /
NK003(ga)012:2273: hu lu hu lu tsan+da li ma tam gi s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)012:2274: phyogs mtshams bcings pa rnams dkrol bar gyur /
NK003(ga)012:2275: badz+ra ag+ne pra d+ai pa ta ye s+w+aa h+aa'i sngags rgyas /
NK003(ga)012:2276: rdo rje'i go cha gyon par gyur /
NK003(ga)012:2277: na mo rat+na tra y+aa ya /
NK003(ga)012:2278: h'u wa ki li h'u phata kyi sngags rgyas /
NK003(ga)012:2279: bdag nyid bsrung bar gyur bar bsam la /
NK003(ga)012:2280: bkra shis rgyas par brjod cing /
NK003(ga)012:2281: sher snying tshar gcig 'don par bya'o //
NK003(ga)012:2282: de nas dkyil 'khor de la zhal khebs bkab nas bum pa'i 'phro brtsig go //
NK003(ga)012:2283: de dag gi 'od zer dri med kyi dkyil 'khor mchod rten du bzhugs shing 'dzugs pa'i cho ga'o //
NK003(ga)012:2284: na ma sh+r+ai gu ra we /
NK003(ga)012:2285: na mahsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sat+wa b+h+yah 'dir 'od zer
NK003(ga)012:2286: dri med kyi gzungs sogs bklag cing mchod rten dgu
NK003(ga)012:2287: bcu rtsa dagu'am brgya rtsa brgyad gdab pa'i cho ga
NK003(ga)012:2288: ni / der gtogs pa thams cad khrus byas /
NK003(ga)012:2289: nyon mongs pa'i skyon las sems bsdoms shing gnod 'tshe'i las ngan las mgo mjug kun tu sems bsrung /
NK003(ga)012:2290: dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan gyi mthu'i khyad par dang mdo sde'i phan yon la yid ches dang /
NK003(ga)012:2291: sems can thams cad la byams snying rje bskyed de /
NK003(ga)012:2292: khyim pa yin na bsnyen gnas kyi khrims bzung /
NK003(ga)012:2293: rab tu byung ba yin na'ang theg pa chen po'i
NK003(ga)012:2294: gso sbyong blangs na mi 'gal zhing legs pa yin
NK003(ga)012:2295: no // de dag gi mgo mjug kun tu gces pa'i spyod pa'o //
NK003(ga)012:2296: de nas sats+tsha gdab pa la 'debs pa po bdag
NK003(ga)012:2297: nyid bskyed chog ji ltar rig pas rang gi lhar
NK003(ga)012:2298: bsgom nas / yo byad rnams bsham te /
NK003(ga)012:2300: zhes rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags rgyas chu la lan bdun basngagasa te /
NK003(ga)012:2301: 'jim pa dang yo byad thams cad la gtor bas
NK003(ga)012:2302: thams cad gtsang bar bsangs shing bgegs la sogs pas
NK003(ga)012:2305: shud+d+ha na du shwa d+h+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)012:2309: pad zla'i steng du 'jim pa rnams b+h+r+au las rin po che'i phung por bsam la /
NK003(ga)012:2310: rang yi dam du gsal ba'i thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis /
NK003(ga)012:2311: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs rgyud
NK003(ga)012:2312: bskul bas de'i thugs ka nas 'od zer dpag med
NK003(ga)012:2313: byung / des sems can thams cad kyi sdig sgrib sbyangs shing 'jim pa la phog pas /
NK003(ga)012:2314: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin du gyur par mos te /
NK003(ga)012:2315: lag gnyis kyi mthe bong gi mathe'u chung mnan pa kha sprad nas 'jim pa la reg ste /
NK003(ga)012:2316: na mo b+ha ga wa te bee ro tsa na pra b+ha r+aa dza ya /
NK003(ga)012:2318: a r+ha te samyak+sam bud+d+ha ya /
NK003(ga)012:2326: a sho ba ti ma h+aa te dza /
NK003(ga)012:2329: sarba bud+d+ha a d+hish+th+aa na a d+hi sh+thi te s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)012:2335: badz+ra ud+b+ha wa ya s+w+aa h+aas 'bi 'bi bya /
NK003(ga)012:2336: a ra dze bi ra dze s+w+aa h+aas snum bku /
NK003(ga)012:2337: badz+ra d+h+aa tu gar+b+he s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)012:2339: d+harma d+h+aa tu gar+b+he s+w+aa h+aas rgyar bcug /
NK003(ga)012:2340: badz+ra mung+ga ra +aa ko ta ya +aa ko ta ya h'u phata /
NK003(ga)012:2342: d+har+m+aa ra te s+w+aa h+aas phyung /
NK003(ga)012:2343: su pra tish+tha badz+ra ya s+w+aa h+aas dkyil 'khor du bzhugs su gsol /
NK003(ga)012:2344: de ltar byas na mchod rten gcig btab pas bye ba snyed btab par 'gyur ro //
NK003(ga)012:2345: de ltar mchod rten 'debs pa na /
NK003(ga)012:2346: gzhan dag de'i zla la mchod sbyin bya ba dang /
NK003(ga)012:2347: 'phags pa rnams kyi thugs dam bskul ba'i don du sher phyir gyi mdo /
NK003(ga)012:2350: dri med rnam gnyis kyi gzungs kyi mdo rnams bzlas /
NK003(ga)012:2353: dri med rnam gnyis kyi rtsa gzungs tshar gang lcogs
NK003(ga)012:2354: bton pa'i rjes su de gnyis snying po bzlas pa
NK003(ga)012:2355: tsam bya / bum nang du 'bru sman dang rin po che'i rdzas tshad ldan tshul bzhin bshams la /
NK003(ga)012:2356: dri med rnam gnyis kyi snying po'i dzapa gra gcig kyang bzhag /
NK003(ga)012:2357: de ltar mchod rten snga dro thebs par byas nas /
NK003(ga)012:2358: chos bklags pa rdzogs pa dang /
NK003(ga)012:2359: gnas bsrung ba'i grogs gcig bzhag ste /
NK003(ga)012:2360: bar der cung zhig gyes nas /
NK003(ga)012:2361: snga dro'i cha las dge 'dun spyir tshogs pa la mchod ston la sogs pa bya'o //
NK003(ga)012:2362: de dag ni mchod rten gdab pa'i bya ba'o //
NK003(ga)012:2363: de nas dkyil 'khor rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum gsungs pa la /
NK003(ga)012:2364: 'dir bsdus pa'i dbang du byas te /
NK003(ga)012:2365: man+dala che chung ji tsam rigs pa la ba'i rnam
NK003(ga)012:2366: lnga dang dris chag chag gdab nas re'u mig chen
NK003(ga)012:2367: po brgyad dbye / mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad ltar na /
NK003(ga)012:2368: de dag gi phyi'i phyogs bzhi dbus kyi cha re'u mig gnyis re bsnan pa bya'o //
NK003(ga)012:2369: de dag ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i bya ba'o //
NK003(ga)012:2370: de nas lugs ma la sogs pa'i mchod rten de
NK003(ga)012:2371: bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel can gcig dkyil 'khor gyi
NK003(ga)012:2372: dbus kyi re'u mig la bzhag /
NK003(ga)012:2373: de lhag re mig go dgu la /
NK003(ga)012:2374: snam bu dang po gnyis pa gsum pa sogs rim
NK003(ga)012:2375: bzhin re'u mig rnams su dris byugs pa la pad+ma'i
NK003(ga)012:2377: 'phags pa gdan 'dzoms pa'i gdan khri yang bsham mo //
NK003(ga)012:2378: gzungs chab bum pa bzhi yod na phyogs bzhi dang /
NK003(ga)012:2379: gcig las med na slob dpon gyi mdun du bkod /
NK003(ga)012:2380: ngos bzhi'i phyi rol sogs gang 'os su bshams dang mchod pa rgyas par bsham /
NK003(ga)012:2381: grwa bzhir a ka ru dang du ru ka dang
NK003(ga)012:2382: gu gul gyi dud pa 'thul ba'i spos phor bzhi
NK003(ga)012:2386: ba dan dmar po brgya rtsa brgyad dang dkram /
NK003(ga)012:2387: bum pa'i khar bye ma dang yungs kar bzhag cing
NK003(ga)012:2388: bzlas na sa dur khrod dang phyogs kun tu gtor
NK003(ga)012:2389: ro // de dag ni yo byad bshams pa ste /
NK003(ga)012:2390: cho ga la 'jug pa'i bya ba tshar ro //
NK003(ga)012:2391: de nas dngos gzhi'i cho ga ni /
NK003(ga)012:2392: dge 'dun rnams 'dus pa'i thog ma kho nar phyogs
NK003(ga)012:2393: bcu'i 'phags pa thams cad mngon sum lta bur dmigs
NK003(ga)012:2394: te phyag byas nas thams cad gdan la 'khod de
NK003(ga)012:2396: chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ci nus bsgom /
NK003(ga)012:2398: chos thams cad don dam par de lta bu yin pa la /
NK003(ga)012:2399: 'phags pa rnams kyis de kho na nyid thugs su
NK003(ga)012:2400: chud pas sku gsung thugs nam mkha' dang 'dra bar
NK003(ga)012:2401: gyur te sgrib pa mi mnga' zhing /
NK003(ga)012:2402: mthu dang byin rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go 'phang brnyes par yang rung nas /
NK003(ga)012:2403: kye ma sems can 'di dag ni /
NK003(ga)012:2404: chos kyi de kho na nyid ma rtogs te /
NK003(ga)012:2405: rmongs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal mang pos
NK003(ga)012:2406: gzir zhing nyam thag pa'i gnas su ltung bar 'gyur
NK003(ga)012:2407: / sems can thams cad kyang 'khor ba thog ma
NK003(ga)012:2408: med pa nas 'gro ba brgyud ma rnams su bdag
NK003(ga)012:2409: gi gnyen bshes dam pa drin gyi zhing du ma
NK003(ga)012:2411: bdag gis kyang dang po byang chub mchog tu sems
NK003(ga)012:2412: bskyed de 'gro ba mang po'i don dpag tu med
NK003(ga)012:2413: par bsgrub par dam bcas pa'i tshe /
NK003(ga)012:2414: sems can thams cad bdag gis blangs zin pas /
NK003(ga)012:2415: 'di lta bu la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
NK003(ga)012:2416: yal bar 'dor ba ni shin tu mi rigs na
NK003(ga)012:2417: / de dag ji ltar sdug bsngal las ni 'don /
NK003(ga)012:2418: bde ba la ni 'god par bya'o //
NK003(ga)012:2419: de lta na'ang bdag ni dus ngan pa'i sems can spyod pa dang mthu dman pa yin pas /
NK003(ga)012:2420: bdag nyid gcig pu'i 'phral du rlabs po che 'di lta bu mi nus kyis /
NK003(ga)012:2421: ston pa bde bar gshegs pas sngon bram ze chen po ser skya'i zla ba dang /
NK003(ga)012:2422: lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa la rjes su thugs brtse bas gsungs pa /
NK003(ga)012:2423: 'phags pa 'od zer dri med rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs dang /
NK003(ga)012:2424: kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba /
NK003(ga)012:2425: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi
NK003(ga)012:2426: snying po la rnam par blta ba'i gzungs la brten
NK003(ga)012:2427: te phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas
NK003(ga)012:2428: pa dang / dam pa'i chos skyong ba thams cad gdan 'dzom par spyan drangs la /
NK003(ga)012:2429: mthu bstan pa dang dpung gnyen du gsol te /
NK003(ga)012:2430: da lta ni 'phags pa'i mthu dang byin rlabs kyis
NK003(ga)012:2431: 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa bsgrub par byas
NK003(ga)012:2432: la / phyis ni bdag nyid gcig pu'i gzhan la
NK003(ga)012:2433: ltos pa med par thabs mkhas pa'i sgo sna tshogs
NK003(ga)012:2434: la / nas / sems can thams cad la phan
NK003(ga)012:2435: pa dang bde ba bla na med pa yang dag
NK003(ga)012:2437: snyam du byams snying rje byang chub kyi sems drag tu bskyed do //
NK003(ga)012:2438: de nas sa gzhi byin gyis brlab pa ni /
NK003(ga)012:2439: dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang /
NK003(ga)012:2440: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs dang /
NK003(ga)012:2441: tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang chen po dang /
NK003(ga)012:2442: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs kyis /
NK003(ga)012:2443: deng 'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam
NK003(ga)012:2444: par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi mdo
NK003(ga)012:2445: las byung ba'i cho ga bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa'i
NK003(ga)012:2446: chos kyi sku yi mchod rten dgu bcu rtsa dgu
NK003(ga)012:2448: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa dang /
NK003(ga)012:2449: 'phags pa chos skyong ba thams cad gdan 'dzom pa'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK003(ga)012:2450: mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba 'di rnams /
NK003(ga)012:2451: ji ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de
NK003(ga)012:2452: dag gi sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can gyis
NK003(ga)012:2453: bsgrub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa
NK003(ga)012:2454: dang / bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi zhing
NK003(ga)012:2455: gi bkod pa'i yon tan lta bu dang ldan par
NK003(ga)012:2456: dang / gyur te / phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sa gzhi la /
NK003(ga)012:2457: bkod pa thams cad las 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs
NK003(ga)012:2458: pa'i bkod pa las rten pa'i rin po che'i gzhal
NK003(ga)012:2459: med khang chen por gyur pa'i dbus su pad+ma dang
NK003(ga)012:2460: seng khri rin po che'i stan la de bzhin gshegs
NK003(ga)012:2461: pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku'i mchod rten rin
NK003(ga)012:2462: po che sna tshogs las grub pa che ba'i yon
NK003(ga)012:2463: tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i bdag nyid grangs med
NK003(ga)012:2464: pa zhig rom me dkrigs par gyur pa'i mtha' 'khor
NK003(ga)012:2465: bar gzhal med khang chen po'i nang du 'phags pa
NK003(ga)012:2466: rnams gdan 'dzom pa'i gdan khri so so'i smon lam
NK003(ga)012:2467: khyad par can gyi mnga' thang dang 'tshams par grub
NK003(ga)012:2468: pa mdzes pa sha stag 'byung bar gyur cig /
NK003(ga)012:2469: ces lan gsum gyis gnas byin gyis brlab /
NK003(ga)012:2470: phyi nang kun tu yang cha ris dang 'tshams par lha dang mi'i yo byad dam pa /
NK003(ga)012:2473: rgyan dang rol mo la sogs pa phul du phyin pa sna tshogs dang /
NK003(ga)012:2474: phung po gsum pa'i mdo dang bzang po spyod pa'i
NK003(ga)012:2475: smon lam las byung ba'i mchod pa'i sprin rgya mtsho
NK003(ga)012:2476: thams cad kyi bkang zhing rgyan klubs pa dang ldan
NK003(ga)012:2477: par gyur cig / 'phags pa thams cad gdan 'dzom nas /
NK003(ga)012:2478: de bzhin du byin gyis rlabs shing bzhes te longs spyod par gyur cig /
NK003(ga)012:2479: ces lan gsum gyis mchod pa brlab /
NK003(ga)012:2481: dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang zhes pa nas /
NK003(ga)012:2482: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs kyis de bzhin du gyur cig /
NK003(ga)012:2483: ces lan gsum gyis thun mong du byin gyis brlab bo //
NK003(ga)012:2484: de nas 'phags pa rnams spyan drangs te /
NK003(ga)012:2486: thal mo sbyar nas 'dun pa rtse gcig pas /
NK003(ga)012:2487: bcom ldan 'das dpal rgyal ba sh+aakya thub pa la
NK003(ga)012:2488: sogs pa phyogs bcu na dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i
NK003(ga)012:2489: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
NK003(ga)012:2490: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang
NK003(ga)012:2491: bcas pa thams cad dgongs su gsol /
NK003(ga)012:2493: byin rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnga' zhing /
NK003(ga)012:2494: 'gro ba'i don du smon lam khyad par can mdzad pa las gleng ste /
NK003(ga)012:2495: bdag sogs 'gro ba mang po skyob pa'i slad du
NK003(ga)012:2496: mgon skyabs su gsol nas spyan 'dren cing mchis na
NK003(ga)012:2497: / mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil
NK003(ga)012:2498: 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad
NK003(ga)012:2499: / de / byin gyis rlabs bar ci gnang /
NK003(ga)012:2503: 'phags pa nyan thos chen po sku gdung ring bsrel dang /
NK003(ga)012:2504: sku gdung gi mchod rten dang /
NK003(ga)012:2505: chos kyi sku'i mchod rten gzugs kyi tshul du rnam
NK003(ga)012:2506: par bzhag pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
NK003(ga)012:2508: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum dang /
NK003(ga)012:2509: bsrung ba med pa gsum dang /
NK003(ga)012:2510: bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid /
NK003(ga)012:2513: ma 'dres pa'i chos bco brgyad dang /
NK003(ga)012:2515: ye shes la sogs pa yon tan bsags pa'i mchod rten dang /
NK003(ga)012:2521: 'phags pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa lum+bi'i tshal du sku bltams pa'i mchod rten la sogs te /
NK003(ga)012:2522: phyogs bcu thams cad na mchod rten khyad par can
NK003(ga)012:2523: 'khor dang bcas pa ji snyed bzhugs pa thams cad
NK003(ga)012:2524: / chos kyi dbyings dang rigs thams cad nas bzhugs
NK003(ga)012:2525: pa'i 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par bgyi ba dang
NK003(ga)012:2526: / / bdag sogs sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams spel ba'i slad du /
NK003(ga)012:2527: deng dkon mchog gsum dang mchod rten khyad par can 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs pa'i gnas /
NK003(ga)012:2528: mchod par 'os pa'i bde ba sbyar ba thams cad kyis bstabs shing spyan 'dren gyis /
NK003(ga)012:2529: mthu stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad de /
NK003(ga)012:2530: chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'gro ba'i tshul gyis gshegs shing bzhengs par gsol lo //
NK003(ga)012:2531: zhes gtso bor gyur pa spyan drangs /
NK003(ga)012:2532: de nas 'khor du gtogs pa spyan drangs pa ni /
NK003(ga)012:2533: lha'i 'jig rten mtho ris na 'phags pa gang yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis /
NK003(ga)012:2534: chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rtogs shing
NK003(ga)012:2535: gzigs pa dang ldan pas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa
NK003(ga)012:2536: bsal ba dang / bsam gtan dang /
NK003(ga)012:2540: ting nge 'dzin la dbang du gyur pa /
NK003(ga)012:2541: thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'i lha'i dbang po'i cha lugs kyis /
NK003(ga)012:2542: lha mang po dag la dge ba'i bshegs gnyen mdzad cing bzhugs pa dang /
NK003(ga)012:2543: lha mang po gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du brten pa rtogs te 'phags pa'i lam la gnas shing /
NK003(ga)012:2544: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis bsal ba /
NK003(ga)012:2545: dran pa gsal zhing ting nge 'dzin thob pa de dag gis /
NK003(ga)012:2546: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum la sngon bsnyen
NK003(ga)012:2547: bkur mdzad cing dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya cher bskyed
NK003(ga)012:2548: pa / 'jig rten na lha dang mi rnams kyi
NK003(ga)012:2549: chos dkar po'i phyogs rtag tu rgya cher spel zhing
NK003(ga)012:2550: pa / bsrung ba / sems can rnams kyi mi
NK003(ga)012:2551: mthun pa'i phyogs kyi mtshan ma ngan pa thams cad
NK003(ga)012:2552: rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa dang /
NK003(ga)012:2553: sngon gdan 'dzom pa chen po'i ston pa bcom ldan 'das kyis /
NK003(ga)012:2554: nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu /
NK003(ga)012:2557: rgyal po blon po la sogs pa chos dang ldan zhing chos la spyod pa dge ba srungs shig /
NK003(ga)012:2559: so so nas kyang lha'i ngag brtags pas /
NK003(ga)012:2560: zhal gyis bzhes pa'i thugs dam mnga' ba'i 'phags pa
NK003(ga)012:2561: chos skyong ba'i lha mi'i mgon mdzad pa thams cad
NK003(ga)012:2562: dang / gzhan yang mchod pa'i gnas dang /
NK003(ga)012:2563: drin bsrab pa'i gnas dang snying rje'i gnas su gyur
NK003(ga)012:2564: pa'i sbyin gnas ji snyed pa thams cad chos kyi
NK003(ga)012:2565: dbyings dang / rigs thams cad bzhugs pa'i 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par bgyi ba dang /
NK003(ga)012:2566: bdag sogs sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi slad du /
NK003(ga)012:2567: deng dkon mchog gsum dang mchod rten khyad par can
NK003(ga)012:2568: 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs pa'i gnas 'dir gshegs
NK003(ga)012:2570: mchod rten mchod gnas dpal ldan pa //
NK003(ga)012:2571: sku gdung chos sku chos dbyings dang //
NK003(ga)012:2572: rig sngags gsang sngags snying po dang //
NK003(ga)012:2573: phyag rgya byin brlabs gshegs su gsol //
NK003(ga)012:2575: ji ltar smon bzhin yod pa dag /
NK003(ga)012:2577: 'jig rten bskyab phyir gshegs su gsol //
NK003(ga)012:2578: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
NK003(ga)012:2579: mchod rten khyad par 'khor gtogs pa //
NK003(ga)012:2580: 'og min gnas dang lha tshogs dang //
NK003(ga)012:2581: bsam tan bzhi dang 'dod khams drug /
NK003(ga)012:2582: sde brgyad tshogs dang 'byung po kun //
NK003(ga)012:2583: dam tshig can dang thugs dam can //
NK003(ga)012:2584: tshangs pa brgya byin rgyal chen bzhi //
NK003(ga)012:2585: phyogs skyong gza' dang rgyu skar dang //
NK003(ga)012:2586: dkon mchog mthong thos skyabs brten pa //
NK003(ga)012:2587: phyag bgyi thal mo sbyar 'os shing //
NK003(ga)012:2588: mgos gtugs mchod dang kun sbyin dang //
NK003(ga)012:2589: rab tu sbyin 'os kun gshegs shig /
NK003(ga)012:2592: de ltar spyan drangs pa'i 'phags pa'i tshogs phyogs bcu
NK003(ga)012:2593: nas gshegs te 'khor dang bcas pa gdan la bzhugs
NK003(ga)012:2594: par bsam ste / de la sngon du phyogs pas 'grengs nas phyag lan bdun 'tshal te /
NK003(ga)012:2595: ye shes tshogs kyis bskyed pa'i sku //
NK003(ga)012:2596: ming dang gzugs las rnam par grol //
NK003(ga)012:2597: rtogs dang spros las rab 'das kyang //
NK003(ga)012:2598: bsnyel ba mi mnga' rang bzhin can //
NK003(ga)012:2599: dngos dang dngos med mtha' yas dben //
NK003(ga)012:2600: bsam brjod yul las shin tu 'das //
NK003(ga)012:2601: ye shes rnams kyi gnas gyur pa //
NK003(ga)012:2602: rnam dag sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK003(ga)012:2603: bsod nams tshogs kyis bskyed pa'i sku //
NK003(ga)012:2604: dbang phyug chen po'i gnas mchog na //
NK003(ga)012:2605: chos la mnga' mdzad longs spyod pas //
NK003(ga)012:2606: byang chub sems dpa' yongs kyi mgon //
NK003(ga)012:2607: gtsang ma'i gnas nas ma g.yos pa //
NK003(ga)012:2608: gdul bya'i bsam pa ji bzhin du //
NK003(ga)012:2609: 'jig rten khams ni mtha' yas par //
NK003(ga)012:2611: skad cig thang cig yud tsam la //
NK003(ga)012:2612: dga' ldan mchog nas babs pa dang //
NK003(ga)012:2613: 'jig rten sgyu rtsal phul byung zhing //
NK003(ga)012:2614: bdud bcom byang chub 'tshang rgya ste //
NK003(ga)012:2616: cho 'phrul gcig char so sor ston //
NK003(ga)012:2617: cho 'phrul ngo mtshar rmad byung ba //
NK003(ga)012:2618: lha yi lha la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK003(ga)012:2619: ston pa mchog bzhugs gzhal med khang //
NK003(ga)012:2620: dbyibs legs rnam par phye bas mdzes //
NK003(ga)012:2621: kha dog sna tshogs spel legs su //
NK003(ga)012:2622: rin chen 'bar ba mang pos brgyan //
NK003(ga)012:2623: yid 'ong nyams dga' lha ya gnas //
NK003(ga)012:2624: rgyan bkod dkyil na mdzes pa la //
NK003(ga)012:2625: 'phags pa mchod pa'i rten bgyis te //
NK003(ga)012:2626: ston pa 'khor dang bcas la bstod //
NK003(ga)012:2628: de nas bsu ba'i mchod pa ni /
NK003(ga)012:2630: na mo rat+na tra y+aa ya /
NK003(ga)012:2631: na mo b+ha ga wa te badz+ra s+aa ra pra mar+d+ha ni ta th+aa ga ta ya /
NK003(ga)012:2634: badz+re badz+re ma h+aa badz+re ma h+aa te dzo badz+re /
NK003(ga)012:2636: ma h+aa bo d+hi tsit+ta man+ta u pa sam pra ma na ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)012:2638: mchod pa dri med yongs dag pa //
NK003(ga)012:2639: rnam mang rgya che thams cad dang //
NK003(ga)012:2640: so so'i mnga' thang rgya chen du //
NK003(ga)012:2642: zhes pas mchod pa bzang zhing rgya che bar dmigs te phul lo //
NK003(ga)012:2643: de nas bzhugs su gsol ba ni /
NK003(ga)012:2644: sku gdung chos sku byang chub phyogs //
NK003(ga)012:2645: ma 'dres bsrung med bsnyel mi mnga' //
NK003(ga)012:2646: mi 'jigs stobs dang sangs rgyas chos //
NK003(ga)012:2647: rdo rje ye shes tshogs bsags pa //
NK003(ga)012:2648: chos dbyings rig sngags gsang sngags dang //
NK003(ga)012:2649: snying po phyag rgya'i byin rlabs kyis //
NK003(ga)012:2650: mchod rten khyad par ji snyed dang //
NK003(ga)012:2651: dpal ldan bsod nams zhing mchog kun //
NK003(ga)012:2653: rin chen steng dang khri 'phang dang //
NK003(ga)012:2654: gtsang dwangs lha rdzas pad+ma la //
NK003(ga)012:2655: mi gnas tshul gyis gdan la bzhugs //
NK003(ga)012:2657: chos don kun gyi dkyil 'khor du //
NK003(ga)012:2658: dpal ldan dag pa'i gdan bshams par //
NK003(ga)012:2659: ting 'dzin mi g.yo mnyam bzhag cing //
NK003(ga)012:2660: dge ba'i dgongs pas gdan la bzhugs //
NK003(ga)012:2661: gtsang dwangs gdan khri yangs pa la //
NK003(ga)012:2662: thogs med dog pa med pa'i sku //
NK003(ga)012:2663: mnyam nyid tshul gyis bder bzhugs shing //
NK003(ga)012:2664: bde bar bskyang ba bzhes su gsol //
NK003(ga)012:2667: de nas khrus gsol ba las /
NK003(ga)012:2668: dang po phyogs bzhi'i bum pas bkru ba ni /
NK003(ga)012:2669: rnam dag skyon bral byang chub sems kyi dbyings //
NK003(ga)012:2670: rnam rtog skyon bral yon tan tshogs kyi gter //
NK003(ga)012:2671: kun gyis phyag byas mchod cing bstod pa'i gnas //
NK003(ga)012:2672: bdud bzhi'i dpung rnams ma lus tshar bcad phyir //
NK003(ga)012:2673: chos dbyings dag pa'i sku la khrus chab gsol //
NK003(ga)012:2674: nyon mongs 'khrul pa'i rtog pa dag gyur cig /
NK003(ga)012:2675: ji ltar me long gzugs brnyan snang gyur kyang //
NK003(ga)012:2676: chos dbyings dag pa'i sku la bskyod pa med //
NK003(ga)012:2677: rin chen lnga las grub pa'i mchod rten dang //
NK003(ga)012:2678: sa'am chu'am 'on te bar snang la /
NK003(ga)012:2679: sems can don du rin chen skur bstan pa //
NK003(ga)012:2680: mchod rten dmigs par bcas te sku khrus gsol //
NK003(ga)012:2681: khams gsum gnas pa'i bag chags dag gyur cig /
NK003(ga)012:2682: gzhi rming dge bcu rnam dag pad+ma 'jam //
NK003(ga)012:2683: dran pa nyer bzhag rming gzhi khri 'phang bstod //
NK003(ga)012:2684: theg pa rnams kyi bang rim brtsegs pa ste //
NK003(ga)012:2685: chos dbyings spros med bum pa zlum po la //
NK003(ga)012:2686: smon lam chen po'i srog shing dge ba btsugs //
NK003(ga)012:2687: dge ba'i longs spyod nam mkha'i gdugs kyis bkab //
NK003(ga)012:2688: byang chub sems kyi zla tshes rnam par dag /
NK003(ga)012:2689: dge ste bcu gsum 'khor lo'i phreng bas brgyan //
NK003(ga)012:2690: snang dbyings chos kyi sku la sku khrus gsol //
NK003(ga)012:2691: shar phyogs byams pa brtsegs pa'i chos sku la //
NK003(ga)012:2692: byams pa'i sems kyi sku khrus 'di gsol bas //
NK003(ga)012:2693: zhe sdang gdug pa'i tshogs rnams kun bsal nas //
NK003(ga)012:2694: rtag tu byams pa'i ting 'dzin thob gyur cig /
NK003(ga)012:2695: lho phyogs rin chen brtsegs pa'i chos sku la //
NK003(ga)012:2696: nga rgyal gdug pa'i tshogs rnams bsal ba'i phyir //
NK003(ga)012:2697: byang chub sems kyi chu bos sku khrus gsol //
NK003(ga)012:2698: khams gsum 'khor ba'i nga rgyal skyon bral nas //
NK003(ga)012:2699: rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan thob gyur cig /
NK003(ga)012:2700: nub phyogs pad+ma dag pa chos kyi dbyings //
NK003(ga)012:2701: 'dod chags skyon bral pad+ma'i khri 'phang brtsegs //
NK003(ga)012:2702: khams gsum sems can bag chags sbyong ba'i phyir //
NK003(ga)012:2703: chos kyi sku la ye shes sku khrus gsol //
NK003(ga)012:2704: sems can 'khor ba'i bag chags dag gyur cig /
NK003(ga)012:2705: byang phyogs rnam dag las kyi zhing rab nas //
NK003(ga)012:2706: 'dod sred spangs pa'i yon tan rdzogs par ston //
NK003(ga)012:2707: rin chen in+d+ra lta bu'i mchod rten la //
NK003(ga)012:2708: las kyi sgrib pa sbyangs phyir sku khrus gsol //
NK003(ga)012:2709: sems can rnams kyi 'dod pa 'grub gyur cig /
NK003(ga)012:2710: chos sku rnam dag 'khor ba'i skyon bral nas //
NK003(ga)012:2711: legs pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs par shog /
NK003(ga)012:2712: de nas chu rnam pa lngas bkru zhing /
NK003(ga)012:2713: sku mchog rnam dag lta bas mi ngoms la //
NK003(ga)012:2714: ngo mtshar skyon bral mkha' dbyings nyi gsal 'dra //
NK003(ga)012:2715: chos kyi sku la dri ma mi mnga' yang //
NK003(ga)012:2716: sri zhu bkur sti rim gro'i tshul tsam du //
NK003(ga)012:2717: chu gtsang sman spos 'o ma 'dag chal chus //
NK003(ga)012:2718: gus pas yid kyis sku khrus 'di gsol bas //
NK003(ga)012:2719: 'gro ba'i lus sems sdug bsngal nad bsal te //
NK003(ga)012:2720: nyes pa'i skyon bral 'gro ba yid 'ong ba'i //
NK003(ga)012:2721: dam pa'i sku mchog bdag gis thob par shog /
NK003(ga)012:2722: ces smon lam re re'i mthar /
NK003(ga)012:2723: sarba ta th+aa ga ta a b+hi she ka ta sa ma ya sh+r+ai h'u /
NK003(ga)012:2725: de nas ras kha tshar ma nyams pas phyi zhing /
NK003(ga)012:2726: bde gshegs sku gzugs dpe dang mtshan mnga' yang //
NK003(ga)012:2727: 'gro ba'i don du gzugs sku cir yang gda' //
NK003(ga)012:2728: rin chen dbyig ltar nyes pa'i skyon bral yang //
NK003(ga)012:2729: 'jig rten sri zhu gus pa'i tshul tsam du //
NK003(ga)012:2730: sdig med rgyal ba rnams kyis rab basngagasa pa'i //
NK003(ga)012:2731: ras mchog 'di yis rgyal ba'i sku phyis pas //
NK003(ga)012:2732: nyon mongs dug gsum sgrib pa kun byang nas //
NK003(ga)012:2733: sku gsum ngang du bdag cag 'gyur bar shog /
NK003(ga)012:2734: sarba ta th+aa ga ta k+aa ya bishwa d+ha ne s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)012:2736: de dag ni tshogs zhing nye bar bsdus te dgod pa'i bya ba'o //
NK003(ga)012:2737: de nas chos spyod kyi yan lag bcus tshogs bsags pa'i rim pa la 'jug ste /
NK003(ga)012:2738: de la dang po phyag 'tshal ni /
NK003(ga)012:2739: ji snyed su dag sogs sh+lo ka bzhi'i mthar /
NK003(ga)012:2740: phyag byar 'os pa zhes sogs sh+loka gcig gis spyi phyag bya /
NK003(ga)012:2741: de nas mchod rten spyi phyag ni /
NK003(ga)012:2742: shes rab chen pos bdag med thugs chud de //
NK003(ga)012:2743: ye shes chen po'i tshogs las byung ba yi //
NK003(ga)012:2744: bde bar gshegs pa'i chos sku spros med pa //
NK003(ga)012:2745: so so rang rig de la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK003(ga)012:2746: 'gro ba'i don du dga' ba rnams mdzad de //
NK003(ga)012:2747: bsod nams chen po'i tshogs las byung ba yi //
NK003(ga)012:2748: bde bar gshegs pa'i gzugs skur gang snang ba //
NK003(ga)012:2749: yon tan mtha' dag rdzogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK003(ga)012:2750: bskal pa grangs med 'das pa'i sngon rol nas //
NK003(ga)012:2751: sems can don du byang chub sems bskyed de //
NK003(ga)012:2752: spyod pas gzhan gyi don la rab brtson pa //
NK003(ga)012:2753: bla med 'bras su brnyes la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK003(ga)012:2754: thabs kyi spyod pas mdzad pa mthar phyin cing //
NK003(ga)012:2755: chos kyi 'khor lo rgya chen yongs bskor nas //
NK003(ga)012:2756: mya ngan 'das pa'i tshul ni rab bstan pa //
NK003(ga)012:2757: sku gdung bzhag pa dag la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK003(ga)012:2758: sku gdung phra mor bsil ba'i ring bsrel snod //
NK003(ga)012:2759: rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa chos kyi tshul //
NK003(ga)012:2760: sems can rnams kyi mchod par bya ba'i rten //
NK003(ga)012:2761: gzugs brnyan nyid kyi sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK003(ga)012:2762: sngon gyi smon lam chen po rgyun mnga' bas //
NK003(ga)012:2763: byang chub phyogs chos sum cu rtsa bdun te //
NK003(ga)012:2764: bang rim bum pa srog shing tshul bstan pa //
NK003(ga)012:2765: rgyu yi chos su bzhag la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK003(ga)012:2766: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma 'dres chos //
NK003(ga)012:2767: thugs rje chen po'i tshad med rab mnga' ba //
NK003(ga)012:2768: 'khor lo char khebs lta bu'i tshul bstan pa //
NK003(ga)012:2769: 'bras bu'i chos su bzhag la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK003(ga)012:2770: mi 'jigs bsrung ba med dang bdud las rgyal //
NK003(ga)012:2771: tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan mngon par mkhyen mnga' ba //
NK003(ga)012:2772: rdo ring them skas rgyal mtshan dril bu tog /
NK003(ga)012:2773: chos sku'i rten du bzhag la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK003(ga)012:2774: chos kyi grags pa ye shes bzhi la sogs //
NK003(ga)012:2775: yon tan ngo mtshar can gyi tshogs rdzogs shing //
NK003(ga)012:2776: gang gis chos kyi rgyal por mtshan gsol ba //
NK003(ga)012:2777: bdag nyid chen po dag la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK003(ga)012:2778: rang bzhin rnam dag chos dbyings de bzhin nyid //
NK003(ga)012:2779: spros pa'i dri mas ma gos dkar ba la //
NK003(ga)012:2780: rin chen spras pas mtshan ma rdzogs pa'i sku //
NK003(ga)012:2781: 'gro don legs par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK003(ga)012:2782: de bzhin sku gdung dbyibs bcas chos sku dag /
NK003(ga)012:2783: gang gis mthong thos dran nam reg kyang rung //
NK003(ga)012:2784: mtho ris dpal dang thar mchog bde thob pa //
NK003(ga)012:2785: yon tan sna tshogs mnga' la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK003(ga)012:2786: de nas dkon mchog gsum gyi phyag ni /
NK003(ga)012:2787: ston pa bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa la sogs
NK003(ga)012:2788: pa phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i
NK003(ga)012:2789: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
NK003(ga)012:2790: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /
NK003(ga)012:2793: 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba /
NK003(ga)012:2794: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston
NK003(ga)012:2795: pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog bla na
NK003(ga)012:2796: med pa thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo
NK003(ga)012:2798: ston pa bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs kyi
NK003(ga)012:2799: sras sa chen po la rab tu bzhugs pa'i byang
NK003(ga)012:2800: chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang /
NK003(ga)012:2801: ston pa bde bar gshegs pa de dag gi gsung
NK003(ga)012:2802: gi sras 'phags pa rang rgyal dang 'phags pa nyan
NK003(ga)012:2804: tshogs kyi mchog bla na med par thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo //
NK003(ga)012:2806: phyogs bcu na mchod rten ring bsrel dang sku gdung
NK003(ga)012:2807: dang bcas pa thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal
NK003(ga)012:2809: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos skyong ba 'jig rten dang
NK003(ga)012:2810: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa thams
NK003(ga)012:2811: cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo //
NK003(ga)012:2815: bde gshegs rnams kyi longs spyod kyis //
NK003(ga)012:2816: kun bzang mchod pas rol mdzad kyang //
NK003(ga)012:2817: 'gro ba'i mun pa bsal slad du //
NK003(ga)012:2818: bkur sti rim gro'i tshul tsam du //
NK003(ga)012:2819: bla med mchod pa rnam lnga 'di //
NK003(ga)012:2821: mchod pa'i sprin gyis khyab gyur nas //
NK003(ga)012:2822: bsod nams gter chen thob par shog /
NK003(ga)012:2824: bde gshegs sku mchog mtshan dang dpe byad ldan //
NK003(ga)012:2825: byang chub mchog gi rgyan gyiis mdzes lags kyang /
NK003(ga)012:2826: rin chen do shal se mo do la sogs //
NK003(ga)012:2827: rgyan gyi khyad par mang po dbul bar bgyi //
NK003(ga)012:2829: de nas de la kha dog legs bsgyur ba'i //
NK003(ga)012:2830: na bza' shin tu dri zhim dam pa 'bul //
NK003(ga)012:2831: gos bzang srab la 'jam pa sna tshogs dang //
NK003(ga)012:2832: rgyan mchog brgya phrag dag kyang dbul bar bgyi //
NK003(ga)012:2834: theg mchog bla bre gdugs dang ba dan sgreng //
NK003(ga)012:2835: bdud bcom rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dar 'phan dang //
NK003(ga)012:2836: gar dang rol mo mchod pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis //
NK003(ga)012:2837: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par brgyan par shog /
NK003(ga)012:2838: ces rol mo'i khyad par du mas mchod /
NK003(ga)012:2839: de nas nam mkha' mdzod kyi sngags rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa'i zhal zas /
NK003(ga)012:2840: rgyal ba'i bdud bcom byang chub sangs rgyas te //
NK003(ga)012:2841: rgyal ba sku la sbrebs skyems mi mnga' yang //
NK003(ga)012:2842: bdag cag bsod nams zhing du 'gyur slad du //
NK003(ga)012:2843: bshos dang zhal zas sbyar ba 'di 'bul bas //
NK003(ga)012:2844: dus gsum dge ba'i lo tog 'phel rgyas nas //
NK003(ga)012:2845: bde ba can du pad+ma las skyes te //
NK003(ga)012:2846: ting 'dzin chos dang zas la spyod par shog /
NK003(ga)012:2847: nam mkha' mdzod kyi sngags brjod de 'bul /
NK003(ga)012:2848: de nas lnga tshan lnga 'bul ba ni /
NK003(ga)012:2849: bde gshegs mgon po dpag bsam 'khor dang bcas //
NK003(ga)012:2850: bsod nams ye shes sku lnga mthar phyin pa //
NK003(ga)012:2851: chos kyi longs spyod bkur sti'i tshul tsam du //
NK003(ga)012:2852: 'bru lnga spos lnga sman lnga rin chen lnga //
NK003(ga)012:2853: snying po lnga bcas rgyal bas rab basngagasa pa //
NK003(ga)012:2854: bdag gzhan don gyi snying por 'di phul bas //
NK003(ga)012:2855: 'gro la phan phyir tshul khrims mchog ldan te //
NK003(ga)012:2856: rin chen gter ltar kun la phan 'dogs shog /
NK003(ga)012:2858: de nas rten 'brel snying pos byin gyis barlasa pa'i yungs kar 'thor zhing /
NK003(ga)012:2859: bde gshegs kun bzang mngon par sangs rgyas te //
NK003(ga)012:2860: rdo rje gdan la mngon par bzhugs pa na //
NK003(ga)012:2861: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin gyis gus bcas pas //
NK003(ga)012:2862: sngags grub rgyal pos yungs kar phul ba ltar //
NK003(ga)012:2863: deng 'dir ston pas bdud bzhi tshar bcad nas //
NK003(ga)012:2864: skye rga na 'chi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las //
NK003(ga)012:2865: bdag dang mtha' yas 'gro ba kun bsgral nas //
NK003(ga)012:2866: rdo rje gdan la mngon par 'tshang rgya shog /
NK003(ga)012:2867: de nas spyan dbye ba'i smon lam gsol ba ni /
NK003(ga)012:2868: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi 'phags pa dkon mchog sum la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK003(ga)012:2869: bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan bzhengs su gsol te /
NK003(ga)012:2870: mchod par 'os pa'i bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis mchod cing bkur bas /
NK003(ga)012:2871: bdag dang ma thas yas pa'i sems can thams cad
NK003(ga)012:2872: kyi sdig sgrib mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad las
NK003(ga)012:2874: de dang de dag phul ba las thob pa'i yon
NK003(ga)012:2875: tan khyad par thams cad ma lus par thob par
NK003(ga)012:2876: gyur cig / rten 'di yang 'jig rten ji srid
NK003(ga)012:2877: kyi bar du mchod pa 'i rten du bzhugs nas
NK003(ga)012:2878: phyogs dus thams cad bkra shis shing byin che bar
NK003(ga)012:2879: gyur cig / gyur cig / 'phags pa sku gdung rin chen ring bsrel snod //
NK003(ga)012:2880: rnying bcos byi dor byas shing mchod pa dang //
NK003(ga)012:2881: gsar brtsigs mchod cing khrus chab gsol ba dang //
NK003(ga)012:2882: bstod cing bskor dang gus par bgyis pa dang //
NK003(ga)012:2883: smon lam bzang po sems yid dang btab pa'i //
NK003(ga)012:2884: byin rlabs yon tan khyad par chen po'i mthus //
NK003(ga)012:2885: bdag cag yon mchod 'khor bcas thams cad dang //
NK003(ga)012:2886: dad mos grogs byed rjes su yi rang rnams //
NK003(ga)012:2887: smon lam mthu stobs khyad par chen po yis //
NK003(ga)012:2888: dang ba'i yid kyis mchod rten 'di brtsigs pas //
NK003(ga)012:2889: deng nas bdag cag sdig sgrib byang gyur te //
NK003(ga)012:2890: bla med byang chub bdag cag myur thob shog /
NK003(ga)012:2891: de nas bkra shis kyi rdzas phul te mnga' dbul ba'i mchod pa ni /
NK003(ga)012:2892: bde gshegs kun bzang mthong bas bkra shis ltar //
NK003(ga)012:2893: rgyal ba 'khor bcas deng 'dir bkra shis shog /
NK003(ga)012:2894: ngan sdig log pa'i tshogs rnams bcom gyur nas //
NK003(ga)012:2895: rgyas sras ting 'dzin tshogs rnams 'phel dar zhing //
NK003(ga)012:2896: zhal mthong tsam gyis bde ba'i mchog brnyes nas //
NK003(ga)012:2897: nyi ltar zhal dro zla ltar 'od gsal zhing //
NK003(ga)012:2898: bdag dang 'gro bas zhal dro byin che nas //
NK003(ga)012:2899: bskal pa'i mthar thug bar du bzhugs su gsol //
NK003(ga)012:2900: de nas mchod yul bzung ba ni /
NK003(ga)012:2901: ye shes tshogs rdzogs sku gsum lhun gyis grub //
NK003(ga)012:2902: bzhi bcom drug ldan mi gnas mya ngan 'das //
NK003(ga)012:2903: thugs rjes sprul pas 'gro ba'i 'dam skems pa //
NK003(ga)012:2904: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa 'bul //
NK003(ga)012:2905: dri med bdud rtsis 'khor ba'i nad rnams 'joms //
NK003(ga)012:2906: don dam dmigs med bde gshegs 'byung ba'i rgyu //
NK003(ga)012:2907: ye shes nyi mas ma rig mun 'joms pa //
NK003(ga)012:2908: 'phags pa'i lam gyur chos la mchod par 'bul //
NK003(ga)012:2909: byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms tshul //
NK003(ga)012:2910: bde gshegs rin chen pad+ma las kyi rtags //
NK003(ga)012:2911: rin chen bzhi las mngon du gyur pa'i sku //
NK003(ga)012:2912: rigs bzhi'i mchod rten rnams la mchod par 'bul //
NK003(ga)012:2913: lho phyogs 'dzam gling rin chen la sogs na //
NK003(ga)012:2914: bzhugs pa'i phyogs bzhi'i mchod rten rnam bzhi sogs //
NK003(ga)012:2915: byang chub phyogs chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang //
NK003(ga)012:2916: rgyal ba'i ma 'dres yon tan kun bsags pa'i //
NK003(ga)012:2917: chos kyi sku yi mchod rten khyad par can //
NK003(ga)012:2918: phyogs bcu kun na bzhugs la mchod par 'bul //
NK003(ga)012:2919: dad brtson shugs kyis lus ngag sems btud de //
NK003(ga)012:2920: brtson 'grus drag pos rin chen sna lnga dang //
NK003(ga)012:2921: 'byung ba lnga las grub pa'i mchod rten dang //
NK003(ga)012:2922: sku gdung ring bsrel rnams la mchod par 'bul //
NK003(ga)012:2923: rgyal ba'i thugs sras byang sems 'phags pa dang //
NK003(ga)012:2924: gsung gi sras gyur nyan rang 'phags pa dang //
NK003(ga)012:2925: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnams dang dam pa'i chos //
NK003(ga)012:2926: skyong mdzad srung ma'i tshogs la mchod par 'bul //
NK003(ga)012:2927: rdo ring them skas chu srin rgyal mtshan dang //
NK003(ga)012:2928: gdugs dang ba dan dar gyi cod pan dang //
NK003(ga)012:2929: pad+ma nyi zla sil snyan lha rdzas kyis //
NK003(ga)012:2930: tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan dmigs pa dag par mchod //
NK003(ga)012:2931: ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya'i mthus bsgyur ba //
NK003(ga)012:2932: yon chab bdug pa mar me dri chab dang //
NK003(ga)012:2933: me tog dam pa bshos gtsang mnyes pa'i mchog /
NK003(ga)012:2934: mchod yon rnam lnga'i tshogs kyis mnyes par bgyi //
NK003(ga)012:2935: dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis sprul pa yi //
NK003(ga)012:2936: 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten grub pa'i rdzas //
NK003(ga)012:2937: kun bzang rnam dag mchod pa'i sprin phung gis //
NK003(ga)012:2938: nam mkha' gang bar dmigs te mchod par bgyi //
NK003(ga)012:2939: srid gsum 'khor ba'i 'dam las drangs pa dang //
NK003(ga)012:2940: 'gro don mdzad pa'i thugs dam bskang slad du //
NK003(ga)012:2941: ye shes nyi mas mtshan ma'i skyon spangs te //
NK003(ga)012:2942: byams pa'i thugs rjes mchod pa bzhes su gsol //
NK003(ga)012:2943: rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod 'os bla med rnams //
NK003(ga)012:2944: spyan drangs phyag bgyis bstod dang bkur ba'i mthus //
NK003(ga)012:2945: sngon bsags las kyi sgrib pa kun byang nas //
NK003(ga)012:2946: 'gro drug tshogs rdzogs mngon par 'tshang rgya shog /
NK003(ga)012:2947: de nas bye brag mchod rten gyi mchod pa ni /
NK003(ga)012:2948: phyogs phyogs nas mchod yon bzed zhal du sbreng bzhin du /
NK003(ga)012:2949: mchod rten sku yi cha lugs ni //
NK003(ga)012:2950: 'og gi rming bting ye shes bzhi //
NK003(ga)012:2951: gyen du khri 'phang rnam thar gsum //
NK003(ga)012:2952: chags med pad+ma'i gdan stengs su //
NK003(ga)012:2953: bum pa zlum po chos kyi rje //
NK003(ga)012:2955: srog shing drang srong bla na med //
NK003(ga)012:2956: 'khor lo bcu gsum ye shes brgyad //
NK003(ga)012:2957: 'bar ba rdo rje ye shes lnga //
NK003(ga)012:2958: bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir //
NK003(ga)012:2959: bla med mchod pa'i rgyun bshams nas //
NK003(ga)012:2960: chu bo gang+g+aa'i rgyun bzhin du //
NK003(ga)012:2961: ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi chad de //
NK003(ga)012:2962: sku yi mchod rten thams cad la //
NK003(ga)012:2964: thugs rjes dgongs te bzhes su gsol //
NK003(ga)012:2965: mchod rten gsung gi yan lag ni //
NK003(ga)012:2966: man ngag sngags kyi snying por brjod //
NK003(ga)012:2967: bzlas brjod gsung rab bcu gnyis brjod //
NK003(ga)012:2968: don dam sgra skad yul las 'das //
NK003(ga)012:2969: bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir //
NK003(ga)012:2970: bla med mchod pa'i rgyun bshams nas //
NK003(ga)012:2971: chu bo gang+g+aa'i rgyun bzhin du //
NK003(ga)012:2972: ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi chad de //
NK003(ga)012:2973: gsung gi mchod rten thams cad la //
NK003(ga)012:2975: thugs rjes dgongs te bzhes su gsol //
NK003(ga)012:2976: mchod rten thugs kyi mtshan nyid ni //
NK003(ga)012:2977: dpe med bsam yas nam mkha' che //
NK003(ga)012:2979: ye shes nyid las sna tshogs rtogs //
NK003(ga)012:2980: shes rab nyid las mkhyen par rdzogs //
NK003(ga)012:2981: thams cad kun mkhyen lhun gyis grub //
NK003(ga)012:2982: don dam sems rtog yul las 'das //
NK003(ga)012:2983: bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir //
NK003(ga)012:2984: bla med mchod pa'i rgyun bshams nas //
NK003(ga)012:2985: chu bo gang+g+aa'i rgyun bzhin du //
NK003(ga)012:2986: ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi chad de //
NK003(ga)012:2987: thugs kyi mchod rten thams cad la //
NK003(ga)012:2989: thugs rjes dgongs te bzhes su gsol //
NK003(ga)012:2990: bla med mchod rten yo byad ni //
NK003(ga)012:2991: rin chen 'bar ba'i srid rtse na //
NK003(ga)012:2992: tsi tra ma ni ye shes bzhi //
NK003(ga)012:2993: bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir //
NK003(ga)012:2994: bla med mchod pa'i rgyun bshams nas //
NK003(ga)012:2995: chu bo gang+g+aa'i rgyun bzhin du //
NK003(ga)012:2996: ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi chad de //
NK003(ga)012:2998: thugs rjes dgongs te bzhes su gsol //
NK003(ga)012:2999: yid kyi mchod rten mtshan nyid ni //
NK003(ga)012:3000: nam mkha'i dbyings dang rgya mtsho'i mjing //
NK003(ga)012:3001: byang chub sems kyi mchod rten spyi //
NK003(ga)012:3002: snang zhing stong la stong zhing gsal //
NK003(ga)012:3003: yid kyi mchod rten thams cad la //
NK003(ga)012:3004: chu bo gang+g+aa'i rgyun bzhin du //
NK003(ga)012:3005: ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi chad de //
NK003(ga)012:3007: thugs rjes dgongs te bzhes su gsol //
NK003(ga)012:3008: rang bzhin mchod rten ye shes sku //
NK003(ga)012:3009: thugs rje'i byin rlabs rmad po che //
NK003(ga)012:3010: mtshan ma'i sdug bsngal yongs bsal nas //
NK003(ga)012:3011: sems can rnams la byams thugs ldan //
NK003(ga)012:3012: bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir //
NK003(ga)012:3013: chu bo gang+g+aa'i rgyun bzhin du //
NK003(ga)012:3014: ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi chad de //
NK003(ga)012:3015: rang bzhin mchod rten thams cad la //
NK003(ga)012:3017: thugs rjes dgongs te bzhes su gsol //
NK003(ga)012:3018: rang bzhin mchod rten ting 'dzin sku //
NK003(ga)012:3019: byams shing snyoms pa kun gyi mgon //
NK003(ga)012:3020: thugs rje chen po skyo dub med //
NK003(ga)012:3021: nub byang rgyal po mig nad sel //
NK003(ga)012:3022: dpal tshogs bkra shis gzhal yas 'dir //
NK003(ga)012:3023: chu bo gang+g+aa'i rgyun bzhin du //
NK003(ga)012:3024: ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi chad de //
NK003(ga)012:3025: sprul pa'i mchod rten thams cad la //
NK003(ga)012:3027: thugs rjes dgongs te bzhes su gsol //
NK003(ga)012:3028: gzugs brnyan mchod rten shes rab sku //
NK003(ga)012:3029: bdud kyi sde dang gshin rje'i 'khor //
NK003(ga)012:3030: srin po'i tshogs dang lha ma yin //
NK003(ga)012:3031: gnod sbyin ma rungs thams cad kyis //
NK003(ga)012:3032: gzi byin mdangs stobs 'joms mdzad cing //
NK003(ga)012:3033: gnod sbyin mang po'i rgyu srang gcod //
NK003(ga)012:3034: gzugs brnyan mchod rten bzhugs rgu la //
NK003(ga)012:3035: bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir //
NK003(ga)012:3036: chu bo gang+g+aa'i rgyun bzhin du //
NK003(ga)012:3037: ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi chad de //
NK003(ga)012:3039: thugs rjes dgongs te bzhes su gsol //
NK003(ga)012:3041: rang 'byung 'dren pa dpa' bo lha yi lha //
NK003(ga)012:3042: bcom ldan sh+aaka thub sku gdung ring bsrel snod //
NK003(ga)012:3043: 'jig rten gsum gyi mchod gnas mchog bzhugs pa //
NK003(ga)012:3044: bang rim ri rab lta bu'i khri 'phang la //
NK003(ga)012:3045: bum rten pad+ma bum bzang snying po ni //
NK003(ga)012:3046: tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu yid bzhin sku //
NK003(ga)012:3047: phyag 'tshal mchod pas brgya byin lus thob cing //
NK003(ga)012:3048: mthar gyi chos kyi rgyal po'i sku thob pa //
NK003(ga)012:3049: yon tan tshogs kyi sku gdung mthu chen bzhugs //
NK003(ga)012:3050: bum pa dbyibs legs srog shing drang brtan la //
NK003(ga)012:3051: 'khor lo gdugs phreng rim pas bgebs pa'i steng //
NK003(ga)012:3052: 'od stong nyi dbyibs char khebs gdugs bres te //
NK003(ga)012:3053: zla ba dril bu cod pan 'jig rten skyong //
NK003(ga)012:3054: phreng ba them skas ba dan cod pan phreng //
NK003(ga)012:3055: rgyan la rgyan bkod 'jig rten gsum gyis brgyan //
NK003(ga)012:3056: chos bzang rnam snang rnam pa thams cad zhal //
NK003(ga)012:3057: gzugs kyi khyad par lta bas mi ngoms khyod //
NK003(ga)012:3058: ye shes tshogs rdzogs chos kyi sku lags te //
NK003(ga)012:3059: rnam rtog bral bas yon tan kun gyi gzhi //
NK003(ga)012:3060: dran pa nyer bzhag rming gi khri 'phang brten //
NK003(ga)012:3061: brtson 'grus yang dag khri 'phang gnyis pa legs //
NK003(ga)012:3062: rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhi khri 'phang gsum pa dge //
NK003(ga)012:3063: dbang po lnga yi khri 'phang bzhi pa bzang //
NK003(ga)012:3064: bum pa byang chub yan lag bum rten stobs //
NK003(ga)012:3065: bre legs 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad //
NK003(ga)012:3066: srog shing shes bcu stobs bcu gdugs phreng bcu //
NK003(ga)012:3067: gdugs phreng ma 'dres dran pa nyer bzhag gsum //
NK003(ga)012:3068: thugs rjes 'phags pa'i chos kyi char khebs lding //
NK003(ga)012:3069: bla med go 'phang gdugs kyi gnam 'phang mtho //
NK003(ga)012:3070: 'jig rten mun sel ye shes zla ba gsal //
NK003(ga)012:3071: tshangs pa'i gsung gi dril bu sgra snyan 'khrol //
NK003(ga)012:3072: rdzogs pa'i byang chub dar gyi cod pan 'phur //
NK003(ga)012:3073: bden bzhi phan thogs 'jig rten skyong bzhi btsun //
NK003(ga)012:3074: tshul khrims phung po me tog phreng ba bzang //
NK003(ga)012:3075: skyon bral srung ba'i ngos kyi them skas mdzes //
NK003(ga)012:3076: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i ba dan dpa' //
NK003(ga)012:3077: bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i chu srin rgyal mtshan grags //
NK003(ga)012:3078: mi 'jigs bzhi yi rdo ring seng ge brjid //
NK003(ga)012:3079: 'di 'dra'i dam chos ngo mtshar rmad rnams kyis //
NK003(ga)012:3080: thabs mkhas thugs rje'i mchod rten tshul du sprul //
NK003(ga)012:3081: nam mkha'i khams la tshon bkye ji bzhin du //
NK003(ga)012:3082: yon tan khyad par kha dog dbyibs su bsgyur //
NK003(ga)012:3083: dpal gnas rin chen 'byung gnas chen po ba //
NK003(ga)012:3084: dus gsum rgyal ba'i mchod rten sku gdung tshul //
NK003(ga)012:3085: dpal 'byung ka nish+ka dang rab byung tshul //
NK003(ga)012:3086: bsod nams phung pos yul khams byin chags shing //
NK003(ga)012:3087: sangs rgyas sprul pa 'phrin las rdzogs par mdzad //
NK003(ga)012:3088: sa bcu'i rgyal tshab byams pa'i gtsug gi rgyan //
NK003(ga)012:3089: dkon mchog gsum gyii bdag nyid chen po la //
NK003(ga)012:3090: ri klung nags tshal chu klung mkhar gnas pa'i //
NK003(ga)012:3091: lha tshogs dad pa'i gnam sa kun nas dkrigs //
NK003(ga)012:3092: sdom brtson rgyal sras 'khor bzhi khyim bdag dang //
NK003(ga)012:3093: dbus mtha'i rgyal khams mi tshogs kun 'dus nas //
NK003(ga)012:3094: me tog phreng ba spel legs mdzes pa dang //
NK003(ga)012:3095: tsan+dana dri bshos mar me rol mor bcas //
NK003(ga)012:3096: bkra shis glu dbyangs bstod pa'i rnam pa dang //
NK003(ga)012:3097: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan lhab lhub brgyan //
NK003(ga)012:3098: lus ngag yid gsum dad pas bstod par bgyi //
NK003(ga)012:3099: de nas 'jig rten skyong ba'i mchod bstod ni /
NK003(ga)012:3100: rgyal chen bzhi la bsang sbyang byin brlab spyi ltar byas pa'i gtor ma /
NK003(ga)012:3102: be ru d+ha ka ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)012:3103: be r+au pak+sha ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)012:3104: be sh+ra ma na ya s+w+aa h+aa rnams kyi mthar /
NK003(ga)012:3105: a k+aa ro btags pas phul la /
NK003(ga)012:3106: shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung //
NK003(ga)012:3107: lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po //
NK003(ga)012:3108: nub phyogs na ni spyan mi bzang //
NK003(ga)012:3109: byang phyogs na ni ku be ra //
NK003(ga)012:3110: rgyal po chen po 'di bzhi dag /
NK003(ga)012:3111: 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa //
NK003(ga)012:3112: phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar byed //
NK003(ga)012:3113: sde bo che la stobs po che //
NK003(ga)012:3114: pha rol dgra rnams rab tu 'joms //
NK003(ga)012:3115: gzhan gyis mi thub thul bar dka' //
NK003(ga)012:3117: kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan //
NK003(ga)012:3118: rdzu 'phrul che zhing lha min dang //
NK003(ga)012:3119: lha yi g.yul yang myong bar byed //
NK003(ga)012:3120: bdag nyid chen po de dag la //
NK003(ga)012:3121: mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal //
NK003(ga)012:3122: rgyal ba'i spyan sngar zhal bzhes ltar //
NK003(ga)012:3123: bstan dang bstan 'dzin bu bzhin skyongs //
NK003(ga)012:3124: mchod rten gtsug lag khang rnams dang //
NK003(ga)012:3125: skye rgu ma lus bde bar srungs //
NK003(ga)012:3126: 'jig rten bde zhing lo legs dang //
NK003(ga)012:3128: de nas phyogs skyong bcu la byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtor ma /
NK003(ga)012:3129: da sha di ka lo ka p+aa la sa pa
NK003(ga)012:3130: ri w+aa ra a k+aa ro sogs kyis phul la
NK003(ga)012:3131: / dbang pa rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha //
NK003(ga)012:3132: sogs shwa lo ka bcu'i mthar /
NK003(ga)012:3133: phyogs bcu skyong ba khyed rnams kyis //
NK003(ga)012:3134: rgyal ba'i spyan sngar zhal bzhes ltar //
NK003(ga)012:3135: bstan dang bstan 'dzin bu bzhin skyongs //
NK003(ga)012:3136: mchod rten gtsug lag khang rnams dang //
NK003(ga)012:3137: skye rgu ma lus bde bar srungs //
NK003(ga)012:3138: 'jig rten bde zhing lo legs dang //
NK003(ga)012:3140: de nas 'khor du gtogs pa'i 'byung po dam tshig can rnams la /
NK003(ga)012:3141: d+ae ba n+aa ga yak+sha sogs kyi mthar /
NK003(ga)012:3142: +aa k+aa ro btags la gtor ma bsngosa te /
NK003(ga)012:3143: 'khor du gtogs pa'i sde brgyad po //
NK003(ga)012:3144: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang //
NK003(ga)012:3145: dri za lha min nam mkha' lding //
NK003(ga)012:3147: rigs nas rigs kyi gtso mdzad pa //
NK003(ga)012:3148: mchod 'os gyur pa thams cad la //
NK003(ga)012:3149: rim gro gus pa mchog bskyed nas //
NK003(ga)012:3151: mi dang mi min 'byung po'i tshogs //
NK003(ga)012:3152: sa bcu bar snang gnas bcas pa'i //
NK003(ga)012:3153: byang sems ldan pa thams cad la //
NK003(ga)012:3155: 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur tam //
NK003(ga)012:3157: 'dir ni rgyal ba dgra rgyal bden gang gi //
NK003(ga)012:3158: sogs sh+lo ka gcig brjod do //
NK003(ga)012:3159: gsum pa sdig pa bshags pa ni /
NK003(ga)012:3160: khams gsum 'gro ba skyes gnas bzhi //
NK003(ga)012:3161: 'khor ba'i rgyud du gtogs kun dang //
NK003(ga)012:3162: rigs mthun skyes pa bdag cag gis //
NK003(ga)012:3163: dug gsum dbang gi sgo gsum nas //
NK003(ga)012:3164: las dang nyon mongs skye ba'i rgyu //
NK003(ga)012:3165: mtshams med lnga dang nye ba lnga //
NK003(ga)012:3166: mi dge bcu dang log pa bzhi //
NK003(ga)012:3167: sgrib pa rnams dang kun sbyor dang //
NK003(ga)012:3168: de yi rgyu dang 'bras bu dang //
NK003(ga)012:3169: yun ring 'khor zhing mi khom brgyad //
NK003(ga)012:3170: mtho ris thar pa'i lam 'gog cing //
NK003(ga)012:3171: bdag dang gzhan la yongs gdung ba'i //
NK003(ga)012:3172: kha na ma tho ci bgyis pa //
NK003(ga)012:3173: chos dbyings phyogs bcu dus gsum dang //
NK003(ga)012:3174: rigs rnams kun la rab bzhugs pa'i //
NK003(ga)012:3175: rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams la //
NK003(ga)012:3176: ma lus bshags shing sdom par bgyi //
NK003(ga)012:3177: bzhi pa rjes su yi rang ba ni /
NK003(ga)012:3178: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas sras bcas dang //
NK003(ga)012:3179: rang rgyal nyan thos thams cad dang //
NK003(ga)012:3180: 'gro kun bsod nams ye shes kyi //
NK003(ga)012:3181: rgyu dang 'bras bu thams cad dang //
NK003(ga)012:3182: skyon rnams spong zhing yon tan thob //
NK003(ga)012:3183: chags bral mnyam bzhag pa dang ni //
NK003(ga)012:3184: de yi 'bras bu khyad par dang //
NK003(ga)012:3185: dge ba'i bshes dang dam chos 'dzin //
NK003(ga)012:3186: byang chub sems mchog bskyed byed cing //
NK003(ga)012:3187: bdag gzhan smin par byed pa dang //
NK003(ga)012:3188: lam dang 'bras bu thob pa dang //
NK003(ga)012:3189: bla med go 'phang mchog thob pa //
NK003(ga)012:3190: de dag kun la yi rang zhing //
NK003(ga)012:3191: bsam dang sbyor ba dag pa yis //
NK003(ga)012:3192: 'gro ba kun la bde slad du //
NK003(ga)012:3193: 'khor gsum dag pa'i tshul gyis bsgrub //
NK003(ga)012:3194: lnga pa chos 'khor bskor bar bskul ba ni /
NK003(ga)012:3195: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten snang mdzad pa //
NK003(ga)012:3196: bde gshegs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
NK003(ga)012:3197: rigs 'khrungs lung bstan dbang bskur ba //
NK003(ga)012:3198: byang chub rim par sangs rgyas pa //
NK003(ga)012:3199: dam chos btsun par mdzad pa dang //
NK003(ga)012:3200: gdul bya'i don la bzhes pa dang //
NK003(ga)012:3201: rgya che zab pa rtogs dka' bas //
NK003(ga)012:3202: bskul ba'i don la bzhes rnams la //
NK003(ga)012:3203: chos kyi snang ba rgyas pa dang //
NK003(ga)012:3204: 'gro ba kun la bde ba dang //
NK003(ga)012:3205: rgya che zab par bstan pa dang //
NK003(ga)012:3206: sngon gyi thugs dam bskang ba'i phyir //
NK003(ga)012:3207: tshangs pa 'dra bar tshul bsgyur te //
NK003(ga)012:3208: rim gro gus pa mchog bskyed cing //
NK003(ga)012:3209: thal mo sbyar bas rab btud de //
NK003(ga)012:3210: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul //
NK003(ga)012:3211: drug pa mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba 'debs pa ni /
NK003(ga)012:3213: bde gshegs bdud bzhi nges bcom zhing //
NK003(ga)012:3214: rdzogs sangs rgyas nas 'khor lo bskor //
NK003(ga)012:3215: 'gro don sangs rgyas mdzad pa mdzad //
NK003(ga)012:3217: 'du byed mi rtag bstan pa dang //
NK003(ga)012:3218: gdul bya brtson pa bskyed slad du //
NK003(ga)012:3219: mya ngan mda' ston bzhed rnams la //
NK003(ga)012:3220: thal mo sbyar ba rab btud de //
NK003(ga)012:3221: 'gro ba kun la phan pa dang //
NK003(ga)012:3222: bde ba bskyed par bya ba dang //
NK003(ga)012:3223: chos tshul yun ring spel ba'i phyir //
NK003(ga)012:3224: chos dbyings brtan pa'i lus bzhin du //
NK003(ga)012:3225: mya ngan mi 'da' g.yung drung sku //
NK003(ga)012:3226: stug po bkod pa'i bdag nyid rnams //
NK003(ga)012:3227: bskal pa'i mthar yang bzhugs par gsol //
NK003(ga)012:3228: bdun pa skyabs su 'gro ba ni /
NK003(ga)012:3229: byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar //
NK003(ga)012:3230: sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su mchi //
NK003(ga)012:3231: chos dang byang chub sems dpa' yi //
NK003(ga)012:3232: tshogs la'ang de bzhin skyabs su mchi //
NK003(ga)012:3233: brgyad pa sems bskyed pa la sogs pa ni /
NK003(ga)012:3234: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang rgyal ba'i sras //
NK003(ga)012:3235: dpang gyur spyan gyur tshad mar gyur //
NK003(ga)012:3236: 'gro don mdzad par dbang gyur pa //
NK003(ga)012:3237: byang chub blo mnga' dgongs su gsol //
NK003(ga)012:3238: ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba dang //
NK003(ga)012:3239: rgyal sras dpa' bo de dag gis //
NK003(ga)012:3240: 'gro la phan dang bde slad du //
NK003(ga)012:3241: byang chub snying por bzhugs su gsol //
NK003(ga)012:3242: dngos po kun dang bral ba dang //
NK003(ga)012:3243: phung po khams dang skye mched dang //
NK003(ga)012:3244: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa //
NK003(ga)012:3245: bdag med chos kyi bdag nyid kyis //
NK003(ga)012:3246: rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa //
NK003(ga)012:3247: stong nyid rang bzhin thugs bskyed ltar //
NK003(ga)012:3248: bdag dang rigs mthun gzhan gyis kyang //
NK003(ga)012:3249: bla med byang chub sems bskyed bgyi //
NK003(ga)012:3251: dkon mchog gsum gyi byin rlabs dang //
NK003(ga)012:3252: 'phags pa kun gyi thugs rje dang //
NK003(ga)012:3253: chos nyid dag pa'i mthu dang ni //
NK003(ga)012:3254: bsam dang sbyor ba dag pa yis //
NK003(ga)012:3255: khams gsum rgyud lnga gnas bzhi na //
NK003(ga)012:3256: gzugs can gzugs med ma yin dang //
NK003(ga)012:3257: 'du shes med dang yon min dang //
NK003(ga)012:3258: sems can rigs rnams ji snyed pas //
NK003(ga)012:3259: so so'i skye bor gtogs pa'i sa //
NK003(ga)012:3260: sdug bsngal thams cad myur spangs te //
NK003(ga)012:3262: nges par legs pa rtogs gyur cig /
NK003(ga)012:3263: 'phags lam brnyes pa thams cad kyis //
NK003(ga)012:3264: gong ma'i yon tan mchog thob cing //
NK003(ga)012:3265: bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis //
NK003(ga)012:3266: bde ba dag la gzhon gyur cig /
NK003(ga)012:3269: da lta'i dus dang phyogs bcu yi //
NK003(ga)012:3270: 'jig rten khams na gang bzhugs pa'i //
NK003(ga)012:3271: rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyis //
NK003(ga)012:3272: bsod nams dang ni ye shes tshogs //
